original_text:
The valleys of the sea were exposed
    and the foundations of the earth laid bare
at your rebuke, Lord,
    at the blast of breath from your nostrils.
korean_text: 이럴 때에 여호와의 꾸지람과 콧김으로 말미암아 물 밑이 드러나고 세상의 터가 나타났도다

sentences.original_text: The valleys of the sea were exposed
and the foundations of the earth laid bare
at the blast of breath from your nostrils.
